definition: A secret combination of characters, typically alphanumeric, used to gain access to a protected system, device, or online account. It is commonly employed for security purposes to authenticate and verify the identity of a user before granting access to restricted resources.

examples.german: Das Passwort muss mindestens 8 Zeichen lang sein.
examples.english: The password must be at least 8 characters long.

examples.german: Vergessen Sie nicht, Ihr Passwort regelmäßig zu ändern.
examples.english: Don't forget to change your password regularly.

examples.german: Bitte geben Sie Ihr Passwort erneut ein, um es zu bestätigen.
examples.english: Please re-enter your password to confirm it.

examples.german: Das Passwort darf keine Sonderzeichen enthalten.
examples.english: The password must not contain any special characters.
Your password has been successfully changed.
